verses.verse: בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old שְׁתֵּ֨ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Teim both עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh ten שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh Manasseh בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> ve-ma-le-Cho, when he began to reign וַחֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <S%H2572><s%> va-cha-mish-Shim fifty וְחָמֵשׁ֙ <S%H2568><s%> ve-cha-Mesh and five שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach and reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim; in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem name אִמּ֖וֹ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo And his mother's חֶפְצִי־ chef-tzi- בָֽהּ׃ <S%H2657><s%> Vah. [was] Hephzibah

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he did הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD כְּתֽוֹעֲבֹת֙ <S%H8441><s%> ke-to-'a-Vot after the abominations הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim, of the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom הוֹרִ֣ישׁ <S%H3423><s%> ho-Rish cast out יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, whom the LORD מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei before בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיָּ֗שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shov, again וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven For he built up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבָּמ֔וֹת <S%H1116><s%> hab-ba-Mot, the high places אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אִבַּ֖ד <S%H6><s%> 'ib-Bad had destroyed חִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2396><s%> chiz-ki-Ya-hu which Hezekiah אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv; his father וַיָּ֨קֶם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kem and he reared up מִזְבְּחֹ֜ת <S%H4196><s%> miz-be-Chot altars לַבַּ֗עַל <S%H1168><s%> lab-Ba-'al, for Baal וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as and made אֲשֵׁרָה֙ <S%H842><s%> 'a-she-Rah a grove כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah, as did אַחְאָב֙ <S%H256><s%> 'ach-'Av Ahab מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וַיִּשְׁתַּ֙חוּ֙ <S%H7812><s%> vai-yish-Ta-chu and worshipped לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> tze-Va all the host הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim, of heaven וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> vai-ya-'a-Vod and served אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam.

וּבָנָ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> u-va-Nah And he built מִזְבְּחֹ֖ת <S%H4196><s%> miz-be-Chot altars בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit in the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher of which אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar said יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of which the LORD בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim In Jerusalem אָשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> 'a-Sim will I put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמִֽי׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mi. my name

וַיִּ֥בֶן <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven And he built מִזְבְּח֖וֹת <S%H4196><s%> miz-be-Chot altars לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol for all צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> tze-Va for all the host הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of heaven בִּשְׁתֵּ֖י <S%H8147><s%> bish-Tei in the two חַצְר֥וֹת <S%H2691><s%> chatz-Rot courts בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְהֶעֱבִ֤יר <S%H5674><s%> ve-he-'e-Vir pass אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנוֹ֙ <S%H1121><s%> be-No And he made his son בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh, through the fire וְעוֹנֵ֣ן <S%H6049><s%> ve-'o-Nen and observed times וְנִחֵ֔שׁ <S%H5172><s%> ve-ni-Chesh, and used enchantments וְעָ֥שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'A-sah and dealt א֖וֹב <S%H178><s%> ov with familiar spirits וְיִדְּעֹנִ֑ים <S%H3049><s%> ve-yid-de-'o-Nim; and wizards הִרְבָּ֗ה <S%H7235><s%> hir-Bah, much לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot he wrought הָרַ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' wickedness בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD לְהַכְעִֽיס׃ <S%H3707><s%> le-hach-'Is. to provoke [him] to anger

וַיָּ֕שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem And he set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פֶּ֥סֶל <S%H6459><s%> Pe-sel a graven image הָאֲשֵׁרָ֖ה <S%H842><s%> ha-'a-she-Rah of the grove אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher of which עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah; that he had made בַּבַּ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> bab-Ba-yit, in the house אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of which the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid to David וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- about שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh and to Solomon בְנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No, his son בַּבַּ֨יִת <S%H1004><s%> bab-Ba-yit In this house הַזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> u-vi-ru-sha-Lim, and in Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בָּחַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H977><s%> ba-Char-ti which I have chosen מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> shiv-Tei out of all tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אָשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> 'a-Sim will I put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> she-Mi my name לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam. for ever

וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not אֹסִ֗יף <S%H3254><s%> 'o-Sif, any more לְהָנִיד֙ <S%H5110><s%> le-ha-Nid move רֶ֣גֶל <S%H7272><s%> Re-gel Neither will I make the feet יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah, out of the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti which I gave לַֽאֲבוֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-Tam; their fathers רַ֣ק׀ <S%H7535><s%> rak but אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if יִשְׁמְר֣וּ <S%H8104><s%> yish-me-Ru only if they will observe לַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot, to do כְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> ke-Chol to all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which צִוִּיתִ֔ים <S%H6680><s%> tziv-vi-Tim, according to all that I have commanded וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-le-chol- to all הַ֨תּוֹרָ֔ה <S%H8451><s%> hat-to-Rah, them and according to all the law אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam עַבְדִּ֥י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Di that my servant מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh. Moses

וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo did not שָׁמֵ֑עוּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Me-'u; But they hearkened וַיַּתְעֵ֤ם <S%H8582><s%> vai-yat-'Em seduced מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh not and Manasseh לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot them to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָרָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra', more evil מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- more הַ֨גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim, than did the nations אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom הִשְׁמִ֣יד <S%H8045><s%> hish-Mid destroyed יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, whom the LORD מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei before בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- by עֲבָדָ֥יו <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dav his servants הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> han-ne-vi-'Im the prophets לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

יַעַן֩ <S%H3282><s%> ya-'An because אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who עָשָׂ֜ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah hath done מְנַשֶּׁ֤ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh Because Manasseh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah הַתֹּעֵב֣וֹת <S%H8441><s%> hat-to-'e-Vot these abominations הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, these הֵרַ֕ע <S%H7489><s%> he-Ra' [and] hath done wickedly מִכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who עָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su did הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri above all that the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav; which [were] before וַיַּחֲטִ֥א <S%H2398><s%> vai-ya-cha-Ti also to sin גַֽם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah him and hath made Judah בְּגִלּוּלָֽיו׃ <S%H1544><s%> be-gil-lu-Lav. with his idols פ Peh

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הִנְנִי֙ <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold מֵבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> me-Vi Behold I [am] bringing רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah, [such] evil עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim upon Jerusalem וִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> vi-hu-Dah; and Judah אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- whoever; שֹׁמְעָיו sho-me-'av כשֹׁ֣מְעָ֔הּ <S%H8085><s%> sho-me-'Ah, listen קתִּצַּ֖לְנָה <S%H6750><s%> titz-Tzal-nah shall tingle שְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei of it both אָזְנָֽיו׃ <S%H241><s%> 'a-ze-Nav. his ears

וְנָטִ֣יתִי <S%H5186><s%> ve-na-Ti-ti And I will stretch עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim, over Jerusalem אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et קָ֣ו <S%H6957><s%> kav the line שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> sho-me-Ron, of Samaria וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מִשְׁקֹ֖לֶת <S%H4949><s%> mish-Ko-let and the plummet בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house אַחְאָ֑ב <S%H256><s%> 'ach-'Av; of Ahab וּמָחִ֨יתִי <S%H4229><s%> u-ma-Chi-ti and I will wipe אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim Jerusalem כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher- one יִמְחֶ֤ה <S%H4229><s%> yim-Cheh as [a man] wipeth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַצַּלַּ֙חַת֙ <S%H6747><s%> hatz-tzal-La-chat a dish מָחָ֔ה <S%H4229><s%> ma-Chah, wiping וְהָפַ֖ךְ <S%H2015><s%> ve-ha-Fach [it] and turning עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over פָּנֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-ha. [it] upside down
